Class Rabbit

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulations.Animal
      • simulations.Rabbit

  • public class Rabbit
extends Animal
    A simple model of a rabbit. Rabbits age, move, breed, and die.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act(java.util.List<Animal> newAnimals)
        This is what the rabbit does most of the time - it runs around. Sometimes it will breed or die of old age.
        Specified by:
        act in class Animal
        Parameters:
        newAnimals - A list to return newly born animals.

      • giveBirth

        public void giveBirth(java.util.List<Animal> newAnimals)
        Check whether or not this rabbit is to give birth at this step. New births will be made into free adjacent locations.
        Specified by:
        giveBirth in class Animal
        Parameters:
        newAnimals - A list to return newly born animals.
